Regulation Name(s): Bilirubin (total and unbound) in the neonate test system
Methodologies: Optical density difference at two wavelengths
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Draeger Jaundice Meter JM-105, a non-invasive transcutaneous bilirubinometer for newborn infants
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to assist clinicians in monitoring newborn infants for hyperbilirubinemia via non-invasive measurement of yellowness of subcutaneous tissue, used in hospitals, clinics, or physician offices under supervision and in conjunction with other clinical signs and laboratory measurements
